title: Forget All Request
description: Immediately cancel the real-time streams of messages of given type.

oneOf.description: Cancel all streams of a single type
Cancel all streams of multiple types

forget_all.description: Cancel all streams by type. The value can be either a single type e.g. `"ticks"`, or an array of multiple types e.g. `["candles", "ticks"]`.

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.
